mapper.insert: INSERT INTO company( company_name, company_phone, company_site, company_desc, priority, create_date ) VALUES ( #{companyName}, #{companyPhone}, #{companySite}, #{companyDesc}, #{priority}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE company SET company_name = #{companyName}, company_phone = #{companyPhone}, company_site = #{companySite}, company_desc = #{companyDesc}, priority = #{priority}, WHERE company_id = #{companyId}
mapper.select: SELECT company_id, company_name, company_phone, company_site, company_desc, priority FROM company WHERE company_id = #{_parameter} AND is_active = 1
SELECT company_id, company_name, company_phone, company_site, company_desc FROM company WHERE is_active = 1 ORDER BY priority ASC
